title: Peter Andre shares hilarious clip of daughter Princess after he pulls off massive prank
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Peter Andre has shared a hysterical clip of his daughter Princess, who he shares with ex wife Katie Price , being hoodwinked after he left her a gift.

In the footage, that the Mysterious Girl hitmaker, 46, uploaded onto Instagram on Wednesday, Princess was ecstatic to have been gifted - with what she thought - were Apple wireless headphones that cost from £149- £199.

The 12-year-old filmed herself unboxing the white packaging as she thanked her dad for giving her airpods as she gushed: "Oh my God, thank you, I am so happy you got me Airpods! I am so happy, thank you so much."

She continued to open the box, and was unable to hide her glee as she added: "Oh my God!"

Then as she looked inside the small packet, she discovered it was empty as her face looked disappointed.

Frustrated, she told: "Dad! That is not funny!"

(Image: Instagram)

Finding his prank hilarious, Peter shared the clip online and wrote alongside it: "These are the kind of random things my kids send me. She does make me laugh. #airpodsnoairpods #gotcha."

His fans took to the comments to share their amusement at the harmless joke.

One typed out three crying with laughter emojis alongside: "that's hilarious."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Another contributed: "@peterandre That’s so funny! The look on her face!"

"Oh no you didn’t!" and "Your kids are amazing Pete! They r so funny," penned others.

Peter's prank comes after his children Junior and Princess were seen having a nice time in the company of their dad as they kicked back and relaxed in his gleaming abode that he shares with his second wife Emily MacDonagh, who he shares daughter Amelia, five, and son Theodore, two, with.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: PA)

Peter uploaded snaps and footage of them onto Instagram on Tuesday.

The children posed with their father, in a selfie that saw the trio beaming, as they snuggled up together in his spick and span living room.

The star captioned the snap, in reference to Princess' nickname: "Bista making us laugh."
description: The TV presenter and former hitmaker tricked his daughter into thinking he had brought her a pricey gift
